other_tests.findings: Sparse perivascular and interstitial inflammatory infiltrate consistent with cellulitis with negative tissue bacterial cultures.
Positive after 48 hours of incubation revealing curved gram-negative bacilli identified as Helicobacter cinaedi.
Minimum inhibitory concentrations to penicillin, tetracycline, and meropenem were 4 µg/mL, 2 µg/mL, and 0.032 µg/mL, respectively.
